TITLE: Account & Billing FAQ
SOURCE: https://example.com/help/account
LAST_UPDATED: 2025-06-12

Q: How do I change my email?
A: Go to Settings → Profile → Email.

Q: Do you support GST invoices?
A: Yes. Provide GSTIN at checkout…

Getting Started

Install the CLI:

curl -sL https://get.example.sh | bash

Login

Run example login and paste your token…

- Partial refunds for pro-rated subscriptions.
